response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. This exceptional item has been meticulously designed and crafted to deliver unparalleled performance and satisfaction. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it would be an invaluable addition to your collection or operations. For this extraordinary opportunity, I am extending an exclusive offer of $15,000 for you to consider. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information about the product.
